Lebowski.Net.Tcp.TcpServerConnection

Lebowski.Net.Tcp.TcpServerConnection Class Reference

A TCP server that listens to incoming connections and accepts the first one, then providing methods to communicate with it. More...

Detailed Description

A TCP server that listens to incoming connections and accepts the first one, then providing methods to communicate with it.
